thread.title: Something new to sing about: Zombie opera

title: Something new to sing about: Zombie opera
text:
OPERA: What's on the fringe of the opera world? How 'bout zombies Michael C. Moore 9:32 AM, Oct 18, 2015 4:58 PM, Oct 19, 2015 music | entertainment | movies CONTRIBUTED PHOTO Heather Freese (front, from left), Kelli McAuley and Brian Minnick fend off a zombie attack. Copyright 2015 Journal Media Group. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. Show Caption Previous Next 
A few months ago, Kitsap Opera presented “Carmen,” one of the greatest and sturdiest representatives of the repertoire, revered by opera buffs around the world. 
Full story available to subscribers only.
